hero.title: An editorial escape written in sea light.
hero.subtitle: A curated journey through St Kitts where football rhythm meets island stillness, framed in modern editorial luxury.
hero.imageAlt: Aerial ocean view in St Kitts

chapters.title: Chapters 01–05
chapters.subtitle: A sequence of cinematic moments, each revealing a new texture of the island.

chaptersList.title: First Light Arrival
chaptersList.copy: Landing with golden sunrise across Basseterre and the gentle tempo of the promenade.

chaptersList.title: Green Notes
chaptersList.copy: Exploring rainforest trails, hidden waterfalls, and the soft hum of the interior.

chaptersList.title: Ocean Calm
chaptersList.copy: Salt water clarity, paddle rhythms, and the horizon stretched clean.

chaptersList.title: Night Market Glow
chaptersList.copy: Evening markets, handcrafted textures, and island flavors under warm light.

chaptersList.title: Closing Frame
chaptersList.copy: A final portrait of St Kitts as a place to breathe, recover, and reimagine.

things.title: Curated island highlights
things.subtitle: Designed to feel effortless, these experiences keep the focus on slow luxury.

thingsList.title: Brimstone Hill Fortress
thingsList.copy: Walk UNESCO terraces and take in the Atlantic panorama.

thingsList.title: Nevis Channel Sail
thingsList.copy: A mid-day sail with soft winds and turquoise clarity.

thingsList.title: Mount Liamuiga Hike
thingsList.copy: A sunrise climb through misty green to the crater rim.

thingsList.title: Black Sand Coast
thingsList.copy: Dramatic shoreline textures and moody editorial tones.

thingsList.title: Plantation Estate Visit
thingsList.copy: Classic architecture, island heritage, and elegant interiors.

thingsList.title: Chef's Table Tasting
thingsList.copy: Seasonal plates inspired by local farmers and coastal markets.

faq.title: Quick answers
faq.subtitle: A snapshot of key planning details for the campaign trip.

faqList.question: What is the best time to visit?
faqList.answer: December to April offers the most consistent weather for editorial shoots.

faqList.question: Do I need a visa?
faqList.answer: Most travelers only need a valid passport and the ETA form.

faqList.question: How long is the ideal stay?
faqList.answer: Five to seven nights allows time for both coast and interior exploration.
